original.not_gemini: ⚠️ Analysis Indeterminate: Image metadata does not match known Gemini signatures. Lossless restoration may vary.
original.not_original: ⚠️ Resizing Detected: Image appears to be compressed or resized. Artifacts may occur.
original.pass: ✅ Verification Passed: Original Gemini signature confirmed. Lossless mode active.
